# VS Code Extension - TypeScript File Maker

This is a VS Code extension that creates TypeScript files with proper boilerplate.

## Project Setup Status

- [x] Verify that the copilot-instructions.md file exists
- [x] Get project setup information
- [x] Scaffold the project structure
- [x] Customize for TypeScript file creation
- [x] Install dependencies
- [x] Compile and test the project

## Features

- Create TypeScript files with multiple templates (basic, class, interface, function, React component)
- Smart file placement based on active editor location
- Input validation for file names
- Automatic formatting with documentation comments

## Development

To test the extension:

1. Press F5 to open a new VS Code window with the extension loaded
2. Use the Command Palette (`Cmd+Shift+P`) and run "Create TypeScript File"
3. Follow the prompts to create a new file
